def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 1
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = -1
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 1
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans -= na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n + bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n * bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na * nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na / nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na + nc
    return ans

def count_valid_altars(n, a, b, c):
    import bisect
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    c.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        na = bisect.bisect_left(a, b[i])
        nc = n - bisect.bisect_right(c, b[i])
        ans += na ** nc
    return ans
